text: 1:27 Rom 9:23; 2 Korin 2:14; Efesus 1:18; 3:8; 1 Timoti 1:1Ezɨ Godɨn nɨghnɨzim kamakɨn, a uabɨ Akar Aghuir modozir kam e an gumazamiziba, an en aka, eghtɨ e fogham, akar modozir kam a guizbangɨra bar dera, egh Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba bar men akuragham. Akar modozir kam kamakɨn, Krais ian navir averiabar aven iti, ezɨ ia fo, a ia inightɨ ia a ko mangɨva Godɨn Nguibamɨn ikɨva, egh ia an bizir aghuiba iniam, ezɨ ia bizir kam bagha mɨzuai.
